pricing information: Additional £35 for having blood taken at a clinic and £59 to have a nurse/phlebotamist come to your house to take the blood. Interest free payments are available.
description: Do you want to know whether you are at risk of common lifestyle-related conditions? Perhaps you’re already taking steps to improve your diet or exercise levels and want to monitor the impact on your health. Finding out where you stand on health issues like high cholesterol, liver health, and vitamin deficiencies gives you the opportunity to take action and make positive changes.

pricing information: Additional £35 for having blood taken at a clinic and £59 to have a nurse/phlebotamist come to your house to take the blood. Interest free payments are available.
description: Unlock a deeper understanding of your health with our most comprehensive panel covering 59 biomarkers. From advanced heart disease markers, diabetes risk factors, and longevity markers, this test is designed for those dedicated to living better for longer. Gain actionable insights to optimise your long-term health.

pricing information: Additional £35 for having blood taken at a clinic and £59 to have a nurse/phlebotamist come to your house to take the blood. Interest free payments are available.
description: Are you looking to transform your body through diet and exercise and track your progress along the way? Our Ultimate Blood Test is designed for those who want to take their health and fitness to the next level — whether you're an athlete, biohacker, or simply someone who's serious about optimising their health. With this test, you can gain deep insights into your body’s performance and make informed decisions to fine-tune your diet and fitness routine, all while monitoring your progress.

pricing information: Additional £45 for a clinic visit to take blood or £60 for a nurse/phlebotamist to take blood at your home.
description: The Baseline Blood Test is a great way to get a snapshot of your overall health and well-being. It's an at-home blood test that provides insights into some of the most essential health markers including bone health, heart function, liver function, and energy levels.

pricing information: Additional £45 for a clinic visit to take blood or £60 for a nurse/phlebotamist to take blood at your home. 3 interest free payments available.
description: Our Advanced Blood Test gives a comprehensive overview of your health and well-being - a full MOT for your body. It provides insights into bone health, heart, liver and thyroid function, energy levels, nutrition, immune health and hormones.

pricing information: Additional £45 for a clinic visit to take blood or £60 for a nurse/phlebotamist to take blood at your home. 3 interest free payments available.
description: Our Ultimate Health Check gives you a full health assessment, checking 47 health markers, including heart, liver, and kidney function, thyroid, muscle, nutrition, immune health, hormones, and more.

pricing information: Additional £60 for a nurse/phlebotomist to take blood. Subscription available
description: Check key health markers including cholesterol, vitamins, blood sugar, and iron. Includes detailed GP report.

pricing information: An additional £20 may apply
description: Having a good quality of life is important to us all – a general health check can help you identify problems with your health early. Monitoring your liver health, diabetes risk and heart disease risk could help you stay healthy for longer. This test can also give you insight into key micronutrient levels, such as vitamin D, iron and B vitamins and your thyroid hormones.

pricing information: An additional £20 may apply. Fasting required — do not eat or drink except water for 8 hours before the test.
description: A general health check gives you a clear picture of what’s going on inside and how to support your body. Check everything from your cholesterol levels to your liver health and vitamin D levels. Thriva doctors always explain the next steps to help you maintain or improve your results. And you can access your health data anytime, anywhere, just as you should be able to.

pricing information: (Or £171 if you subscribe). Phlebotomist home visit or clinic venous draw is FREE. If you arrange it yourself you get £20 off!
description: Covers 45 essential biomarkers to assess cholesterol, diabetes, vitamin deficiencies, anemia, heart disease, hormone levels, inflammation, and overall nutrition

pricing information: £199.50 if you subscribe. Phlebotomist home visit or clinic venous draw is FREE. If you arrange it yourself you get £20 off. Fasting required for 8–12 hours.
description: Includes 56 key biomarkers, providing a thorough assessment of blood health, organ function, chronic disease risk, and overall well-being.

pricing information: Subscription available. Includes in-person investigations such as blood pressure, ECG, and body composition scan.
description: Your great value entry-level package includes key tests covering your heart health and stroke risk, liver and kidney health, essential proteins and iron, cholesterol levels, diabetes risk and more. Suitable for males and females aged 18–79, particularly those concerned about heart health, stroke and blood clot risks.

pricing information: Subscription available. Includes in-person investigations such as blood pressure, ECG, and body composition scan.
description: As well as all the checks included in the Active package, your Core package also includes a blood health profile giving an additional 10 readings including platelets, haemoglobin and white and red blood cell count. Suitable for males and females aged 18–79, particularly those concerned about heart and blood health, stroke and blood clot risks.
bullet point summary: Gets you a full blood count compared to the Active package

pricing information: Subscription available. Includes in-person investigations such as blood pressure, ECG, and body composition scan. Includes a private GP consultation.
description: Your Heart and Stroke Complete package is the most comprehensive cardiovascular health package we offer. As well as all the checks included in the Heart and Stroke Core package, your Complete package also includes a Private GP Consultation and a lipoprotein (a) blood test to check your artery health. Suitable for males and females aged 18–79, particularly those who want a complete overview of their heart, artery and blood health, stroke risk and more.
bullet point summary: Gets you full blood count, lipoprotein (a) and a private GP consult compared to the Active and Core packages.

pricing information: Money back guarantee. Best taken while fasting (typically in the morning before breakfast). Avoid meat in the 12 hours prior.
description: Our general health blood test is a comprehensive health MOT blood test you can take at home and send to our lab for analysis. We'll check your heart, liver, thyroid and kidney health as well as key vitamin and mineral levels.

pricing information: £35 for clinic visit, £80 for home nurse visit, £3.99 postage to lab. No fasting required.
description: This is a great, comprehensive check into your health. It analyses your liver & kidneys, your muscle & bone health, and iron levels. It checks if you have diabetes, and includes a full cholesterol profile. It is an excellent basic test covering some of the most important conditions that could put your health and wellness at risk. This profile can be performed on a finger-prick home test or with a phlebotomy sample.

pricing information: £35 for clinic visit, £80 for home nurse visit. No fasting required.
description: This is a great, comprehensive check into your health. It includes a full blood count and a wide range of essential indicators to show your liver & kidney function, your muscle & bone health and iron levels. It will show whether you have diabetes (HbA1c), and includes a full cholesterol profile. It is an excellent basic test covering some of the most important conditions that could put your health and wellness at risk. This profile requires a phlebotomy sample as it includes a full blood count.
bullet point summary: You get an FBC for £10, deffo worth getting this compared to the general health one

pricing information: £35 for clinic visit, £80 for home nurse visit. No fasting required.
description: This blood test is a comprehensive wellness profile for both men and women and is designed to give you a very wide range of information about your current wellness and many potential risks for future health and longevity. It includes a full blood count, a full cholesterol profile and iron studies. It analyses liver and kidney function, and bone and muscle health. Included is a diabetes check and thyroid function tests. Due to the comprehensive scale of this profile a phlebotomy sample is needed.

pricing information: At-home general health blood test. Delivered in 3 days.
description: Take control of your health with an at-home general health blood test which includes cholesterol, diabetes risk, liver function, vitamin D levels and thyroid function. Your report will let you know what you can do to improve your overall health.
bullet point summary: Not much tested, unclear lab, unclear if doctor report.

pricing information: Shipping additional. Includes capillary blood kit with return packaging and instructions. Sample can be dropped into any red Royal Mail letterbox.
description: Laboratory analysis is conducted using state-of-the-art technology. This private blood test provides an overview of your health by measuring a broad range of parameters related to heart, liver, kidney, and pancreas functions. Similar tests are often referred to as 'well-man' or 'well-woman' checks.
bullet point summary: Useful as a cheap test if you only wanted to check cholesterol, liver and kidneys.

pricing information: Clinic-based blood test. No clear detail on sample handling or optional extras.
description: The General Well Person Profile is a set of tests to assess overall health. This panel establishes a baseline to assess blood counts, kidney and liver function, electrolytes, cholesterol, triglycerides, and thyroid values. Measuring these levels allows you to manage your health and track changes over time.

pricing information: At-home blood collection kit. Report included, but unclear if reviewed by a doctor.
description: Get deep insights into your health by screening 16 key biomarkers across organ, nutritional, metabolic, hormonal, and heart health systems.

pricing information: At-home blood collection kit. Report included, but unclear if reviewed by a doctor.
description: Get unrivalled health insights with our most comprehensive blood test, screening 20 biomarkers across organ, nutritional, metabolic, hormonal, and heart health systems.
